results.title: Metformin mediates neuroprotection and attenuates hearing loss in experimental pneumococcal meningitis
results.text_hl: ...Upon @<m>DISEASE_Pneumococcal_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011008 @@@pneumococcal infection@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment significantly reduced levels of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cytokines and @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ production in cerebrospinal fluid and in astroglial cell cultures in vitro (p < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Muri L, Le ND, Zemp J, Grandgirard D, Leib SL. Metformin mediates neuroprotection and attenuates hearing loss in experimental pneumococcal meningitis J Neuroinflammation. 2019 Jul 27;16(1):156. PMID: 31351490

results.title: Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS.
results.text_hl: Report: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ potential in predisposing @DISEASE_Arthralgia @DISEASE_MESH:D018771 @@@arthralgia@@@, type II cross reactivity secondary to group @<m>DISEASE_Pneumococcal_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011008 @@@A streptococcus infection@@@ & other comorbidities in treating @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.
